Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory338.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTransfiniteMain/FxUiTransfiniteGlow.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Windswept sand pelts against your face, hurting you slightly.'}
{3: 'The surroundings stretch out almost infinitely, with nothing but sand and stones as far as the eye can see.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTransfiniteMain/FxUiTransfiniteGlow.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory34.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory338.jpg'}
{1: '0', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTransfiniteMain/FxUiTransfiniteGlow.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'From what you can recall, you were investigating an abandoned underground research facility with Gray Raven, so why are you...'}
{3: 'You try your best to remember, and one image stands out clearer than the rest—'}
{3: 'That metal gate you struggled to open just a crack...'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTransfiniteMain/FxUiTransfiniteGlow.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory34.jpg'}
{1: 'City ruins. Entrance to the underground facility.', 4: 'Some time earlier.'}
{3: 'City ruins. Entrance to the underground facility. Some time earlier.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'This is our mission objective...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The massive, heavy metal gate barely opens before emitting an ominous mechanical screech before falling silent. No matter what you try, it refuses to budge another inch.'}
{3: 'Fortunately, the gap is just wide enough to pass through. Lucia turns sideways and squeezes through, reaching her hand back through the opening after confirming the other side is secure. '}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory153.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory153.png'}
{3: "You grasp Lucia's hand and, with her help, squeeze through the narrow gap to the other side of the gate."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Our mission is to thoroughly explore this abandoned research facility from the past and determine its exact purpose.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "The briefing mentioned that there's no Punishing Virus in the facility, but now that we're here... Liv?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia calls out, her voice slightly raised, to the Construct on the other side of the gate.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory34.jpg', 2: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I just completed a preliminary scan. There's no Red Tide here, nor any signs of Hetero-Creatures or Corrupted. It's exactly as the briefing stated—zero Punishing Virus concentration.", 4: '11'}
{3: 'Lucia\'s question is quickly answered, accompanied by a quiet conversation, "Lee, please go ahead. I need some time to adjust the Levi-Gun\'s trailing mode." "Alright."'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Even without the Punishing Virus present, we still can't let our guard down.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Lee squeezes through the gap, guarding you in Lucia's place. Meanwhile, Lucia grips the hilt of her Pyro Katana and cautiously explores ahead."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'I tried to look up information about this underground research facility before we left.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Although I couldn't find details about any specific research, the available clues suggest it's likely related to early M.I.N.D. technology.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Equipment failures in facilities like this could produce unpredictable consequences.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's be careful and take this one step at a time.", 3: '59'}
{2: "Once Liv's on this side, we'll...", 3: '60'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTransfiniteMain/FxUiTransfiniteGlow.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory338.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory338.jpg'}
{3: "We'll... what?"}
{3: 'You do not remember. Your memory ends right there—everything afterward is a void...'}
{3: 'Did Liv make it to this side...? What happened after you regrouped...? Where is everyone now...?'}
{3: 'Questions pile up in your mind, but your memories provide no answers.'}
{3: 'Taking a deep breath, you clear your jumbled thoughts and assess your current situation. Your next move should be—'}
{3: 'A voice calls out from a distance, interrupting your train of thought—it is Lee!'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Following the source of the sound, you spot a familiar figure rushing toward you through the billowing sand.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTransfiniteMain/FxUiTransfiniteGlow.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'I finally found you. Are you alright, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The "familiar" Construct\'s face is etched with worry, but you find yourself struggling to utter the words "I\'m okay."'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "What's wrong? Are you injured?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He steps forward and quickly examines you, confirming you are unharmed. Although his expression barely changes, the relief washing over him is palpable.'}
{3: 'But when Lee notices your scrutinizing gaze persist, his expression grows solemn.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Did you hurt your head?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "But from what I can tell, you're still thinking clearly.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I didn't think so either. From what I can tell, you're still thinking clearly.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "So what's actually going on, Commandant?", 4: '1'}
{3: '...Yeah, what actually is going on?'}
{3: 'After you explain the situation to Lee, he glances down and inspects his frame carefully.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Both my visual modules and physical sensors confirm I\'m using the "Hyperreal" frame on my end.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Let me be clear, I'm not tricking you.", 3: '114'}

{3: 'Lee nods silently, surveying the sandy terrain around you before looking down at his frame again. His expression changes as though struck by a realization, and he sinks into deep contemplation.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Do you remember what I mentioned earlier, Commandant? This facility's research might be related to early M.I.N.D. technology.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'This is my theory...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee takes a thoughtful pause before continuing his analysis.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "M.I.N.D. technology is very complex. I suspect the phenomena we're experiencing are likely caused by external interference disrupting our perception of reality.", 4: '1'}
{2: "...You mean we're trapped in some kind of illusion?", 3: '123'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "That's a fair assessment.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Based on our observation, this interference creates both a shared illusory environment and individual hallucinations for each of us... Though the underlying mechanism remains unclear...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'If we can locate and shut down the source of this interference, we should be able to break free from these illusions.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Unfortunately, like you, Commandant, I have no recollection of how we came under this interference...', 4: '1'}
{2: "We'll deal with the interference later.", 3: '128'}
{2: "Let's find Lucia and Liv first.", 3: '129'}
{3: 'You have been repeatedly trying to contact Lucia and Liv through your terminal since your conversation with Lee started, but there has been no response whatsoever.'}
{3: 'Your attempts to pinpoint their location with the locator prove equally fruitless.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Perhaps the interference isn't just affecting our cognition—it's also blocking signal transmission.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Let's keep going for now. I'll collect data along the way to modify your terminal so it can break through the interference and receive signals.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'll leave it to you, then.", 3: '137', 4: "I wonder what's waiting for us ahead.", 5: '137'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "While there's no Punishing Virus within the facility, we might see projections of Corrupted or Hetero-Creatures in our sensory-compromised state.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Since we can't predict the outcome, it's best to avoid any contact with them.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Understood. Let's go.", 3: '140'}
